overview:
John McKinley is the CEO and Founder of OurParents, a service focused on assisting adult children with aging parents. OurParents combines the most comprehensive care prover database on the web with independent care provider quality ratings, powerful tools like the Care Options Advisor, and helpful OurParents consultants, to offer its members immediate, unbiased and free advice about senior care.

McKinley has been an advisor to or member of the Boards of Directors at Equifax,Powerset, MessageLabs,Xoopit, Foundation Capital, and ObjectVideo.

Recent successful exits:

Powerset, sold to Microsoft in 4Q08 MessageLabs, sold to Symantec in 4Q08 Xoopit, sold to Yahoo in 3Q09 AppJet, sold to Google in 4Q09

John is also co-founder of Launchbox Digital, a startup incubator now in its second year of operations.

John was founder and President of Digital Services for AOL where he developed and launched numerous award-winning wireless and online services businesses.

Previously, Mr. McKinley was Executive Vice President and head of Global Technology and Services for Merrill Lynch where he oversaw the creation of the top rated ML Direct and ML Online services. He also served as Senior Vice President and Chief Technology and Information Officer for GE Capital. Mr. McKinley began his career with Ernst & Young, where he was named partner in 1992. He is a graduate of the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.
